intro: I have experienced with a bunch of programming languages such as Java, Javascript, Python, C++, C#, C, Haskell and so on. But I often use Java while trying to solve an algorithm problem or any project given as an assignment. Also I use Javascript frameworks such as React, Vue while coding frontend side of the web applications.

skills: Intermediate level HTML, CSS and JavaScript
Beginner level Unity Game Development in C#

skills: Written and oral fluency in English
